Title: Lake Mungo
Overview: After 16-year-old Alice Palmer drowns in a local dam, her family experiences a series of strange, inexplicable events centered in and around their home. Unsettled, the Palmers seek the help of psychic and parapsychologist, who discovers that Alice led a secret, double life. At Lake Mungo, Alice's secret past emerges.
Tagline: If you've never seen a ghost... Look closer.
Cast: Talia Zucker, Rosie Traynor, David Pledger
